title: A Preview Episode of All Things Murderful with Meredith
itunes:title: A Preview Episode of All Things Murderful with Meredith
description:
This is a PREVIEW of a special series just for the Patreon Supporters ("Bookish Friends") of the Currently Reading Podcast who love mysteries and thrillers. It's called "All Things Murderful with Meredith".

Meredith had so much fun with this new thing that we wanted to share this first episode with everyone!

Today, Meredith is drinking HEB’s Texas Pecan coffee and you can get one of Meredith’s “Scary Books are My Jam” mugs here!

Books mentioned in this episode:

Something procedural (and a series!)

Raven Black by Ann Cleeves, first in the Shetland Island Series

Something creepy:

The Uninvited Guests by Sadie Jones 

A thriller I loved:

The Never List by Koethe Zan

An upcoming release I’m pre-ordering:

Leave the World Behind by Rumaan Alam, author of That Kind of Mother

Came out Oct 6th.

That Kind of Mother by Rumaan Alam

This upcoming book recommended by @roxannatheplanner

A Listener Press:

From Ginny Walter      IG: @ginnyreadsbooks 

William Kent Krueger's Cork O'Connor series (the first of which is Iron Lake). 

A TV or Movie with mystery or thriller vibes:

The Sommerdahl Murders on Acorn TV.

Also mentioned: Still Life movie on Acorn TV.

If you liked this episode and want more of All Things Murderful with Meredith, become a supporter at http://www.patreon.com/currentlyreadingpodcast

Contact the show at currentlyreadingpodcast@gmail.com.

You can find Meredith on Instagram @meredith.reads and Kaytee @notesonbookmarks.

You can visit our website at www.currentlyreadingpodcast.com.
